item.title: [CAMEL-11920] camel-hdfs2 not working in osgi using documented HdfsOsgiHelper
item.description:
Step to reproduce (an osgi environment like karaf or fuse is needed):

  1. Unzip hdfs2-issue.zip to folder HDFS2_ISSUE_ROOT
  2. mvn clean package
  3. Run osgi environment (bin/karaf)
  4. feature:install camel-hdfs2 (adding a feature repo might be needed)
  5. install -s file:HDFS2_ISSUE_ROOT/target/generic-issue-1.jar
